title: Golden Test Images Manifest
description: Expected images for a golden test fixture. Each entry declares the expected filename, SHA-256 hash, and byte size of an extracted image.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor autocompletion.

images.description: List of expected images. Must be sorted by filename for deterministic comparison.

filename.description: Expected image filename, e.g., 'image-001.png'. Uses zero-padded sequential numbering.

sha256.description: Hex-encoded SHA-256 hash of the image file content.

byteLength.description: Size of the image file in bytes.
